verses.plain: LORD, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.

tokens.t: , thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.

verses.plain: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.

tokens.t: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.

verses.plain: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.

tokens.t: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned
from the fierceness of thine anger.

verses.plain: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.

tokens.t: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.

verses.plain: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?

tokens.t: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?

verses.plain: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?

tokens.t: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?

verses.plain: Shew us thy mercy, O LORD, and grant us thy salvation.

tokens.t: Shew us thy mercy, O
, and grant us thy salvation.

verses.plain: I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.

tokens.t: I will hear what God the
will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.

verses.plain: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.

tokens.t: Surely his salvation
nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.

verses.plain: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

tokens.t: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed

verses.plain: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.

tokens.t: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.

verses.plain: Yea, the LORD shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.

tokens.t: Yea, the
shall give
good; and our land shall yield her increase.

verses.plain: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.

tokens.t: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set
in the way of his steps.

footnotes.text: for the sons: or, of the sons
thyself…: or, thine anger from waxing hot
